entry.title: Hop Protocol To Launch DAO and Airdrop Tokens To Early Users
entry.summary: Cross-chain bridge Hop Protocol is launching a DAO and airdropping 8% of $HOP supply to early users.

entry.title: Could Good Dollar Be Crypto’s Answer to Ubi? With Yoni Assia (eToro’s CEO)
entry.summary: Welcome to a very special edition of the Defiant Weekly as we get to joust with one of the most mercurial talents in the crypto space. As the CEO and co-founder of eToro he has probably done more than anyone to bring retail investors into trading with innovations like fractional shares and commission-free trading. Back … Could Good Dollar Be Crypto’s Answer to Ubi? With Yoni Assia (eToro’s CEO) Read More »
